outputs.output_descr: Green Climate Fund Readiness Programme. The objective of the global component of the Green Climate Fund Readiness Programme is to coordinate nine national projects with related (readiness) initiatives and to support knowledge management including analysis of lessons learned and best practices. The global component will enable UNDP to provide technical assistance to the nine national projects in strengthening their national capacities to effectively plan for, access, manage, deploy and monitor climate finance, in particular with resources from the GCF, once it is fully operational.
